gallery.desc: Modern design with ample natural light

gallery.title: Master Bedroom
gallery.desc: Comfortable and spacious with built-in wardrobe

gallery.title: Elegant Bathroom
gallery.desc: Modern fixtures with excellent water pressure

gallery.title: Private Balcony
gallery.desc: Perfect for morning coffee with city views

description: This stunning 3-bedroom apartment is located in the heart of Raj Nagar Extension, offering modern luxury and convenience. The property features high-quality finishes, spacious rooms, and an open-plan design that maximizes natural light. The apartment includes a modern kitchen with premium appliances, three well-appointed bedrooms with built-in wardrobes, and two elegant bathrooms. The living area opens to a balcony with beautiful views of the surrounding area.

faq.question: Can I schedule a virtual tour?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer virtual tours for this property. Please contact us to schedule a virtual viewing at your convenience.

faq.question: What's the process to make an offer?
faq.answer: To make an offer, please contact us directly. We'll guide you through the process, which typically involves submitting a letter of intent and then proceeding to documentation once the offer is accepted.

faq.question: Is financing available for this property?
faq.answer: Yes, we have partnerships with several banks and financial institutions that offer home loans for this property. We can help you connect with them for pre-approval.

faq.question: Are there any additional charges?
faq.answer: The price mentioned includes all applicable taxes. There may be nominal registration charges and maintenance deposits payable at the time of possession.

contact.address: G-2008 Tower 17, River Heights Society, Rajnagar Extension, Ghaziabad

description: This well-maintained 2-BHK apartment in Shastri Nagar is perfect for small families or professionals. It boasts a efficient layout that makes the most of the available space. The apartment is in a peaceful locality with all basic amenities within reach. It features two bedrooms with ample sunlight, two bathrooms, a functional kitchen, and a cozy living room that leads to a small balcony.

faq.question: Is this property good for a rental investment?
faq.answer: Yes, Shastri Nagar has a high rental demand due to its connectivity and amenities, making it a good investment option.

faq.question: Are modifications to the layout allowed?
faq.answer: Minor modifications may be allowed with prior society permission. Structural changes are not permitted.

description: Experience unparalleled luxury in this exquisite 4-BHK duplex penthouse in the prime location of Indirapuram. This property redefines elite living with its expansive spaces, high-end finishes, and breathtaking views from the private terrace. The home features a grand living area, a state-of-the-art chef's kitchen, four en-suite bedrooms, a home office space, and a sprawling terrace ideal for entertainment. Premium amenities include a private elevator access and 24/7 concierge service.

faq.question: Is the terrace private?
faq.answer: Yes, the entire 400 sq ft terrace is exclusively for the use of this penthouse owner.

faq.question: What is included in the home automation system?
faq.answer: The system includes control for lighting, air conditioning, motorized blinds, and audio-visual equipment in the living room.
